email.description: The email address of the user that you want to register.

identity_type.description: Amazon QuickSight supports several ways of managing the identity of users. This parameter accepts either  `IAM` or `QUICKSIGHT`.

user_role.description: The Amazon QuickSight role of the user. The user role can be one of the following: `READER`, `AUTHOR`, or `ADMIN`

user_name.description: The Amazon QuickSight user name that you want to create for the user you are registering.

aws_account_id.description: The ID for the AWS account that the user is in. Currently, you use the ID for the AWS account that contains your Amazon QuickSight account.

iam_arn.description: The ARN of the IAM user or role that you are registering with Amazon QuickSight.

namespace.description: The namespace. Currently, you should set this to `default`.

session_name.description: The name of the IAM session to use when assuming roles that can embed QuickSight dashboards.

arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user
